talk0022: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Sarqso. I'll make sure to restock for you!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I...<sp:5:0:0> I don't want to be harsh, considering
you've bought everything I had for sale...

But if you have other business, I ask that
you wrap it up before my daughter returns
from the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>You've bought everything I have to offer.
I'm really impressed!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Maybe you wouldn't be the worst
influence on my daughter. Perhaps
even a good one.
She's already learned a lot from Ashai's
"<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>" <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff>. I'm sure she'll grow
into a brilliant beauty—like her mother.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Sad>...Ugh. I can't believe the chief is letting
you stay in the shelter. She must be
playing some kind of joke...
You just worry about what fruit you're
going to buy, and don't even think about
distracting my daughter from her studies!
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>You know... <sp:5:0:0>Maybe you wouldn't be the
worst influence on my daughter. Perhaps
even a good one.
Of course, she's already learned a lot
from Ashai's "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>" <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>I would bet you anything that she's going
to grow up to be a brilliant beauty—just
like her mother.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0000>All right.<sp:5:0:0> How many do you want to sell?
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Is this something people in the outside
world actually buy and sell? <sp:5:0:0>Well, we
don't really have a use for them here...
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey, little voe! Trying to sell the clothes
you have on is just silly!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Were you looking for Dalia?


She's usually at the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class
underground<clr:ffff> at this time of day.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>She's a real hard worker, and I bet she
grows up to be a brilliant beauty—just like
her mother.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Don't tell me...<sp:5:0:0> You're here to see my
daughter, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>She's usually with the other kids in town
around this time of day, I believe, but
she's so busy lately.
She attends the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>...
She helps look after the little ones... She
is growing up more and more every day!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm sure she'll be the finest vai
Gerudo Town has ever seen.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, just a minute...<sp:5:0:0>


I hear you and the chief worked together
to clear the sand shroud? Is that right?

...I think I was being overly protective of
my daughter before.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Maybe you wouldn't be the worst
influence on her. Perhaps even a
good one.
She's already learned a lot from Ashai's
"<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>" <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff>. I bet she grows up
to be a brilliant beauty—like her mother.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Maybe you wouldn't be the worst
influence on my daughter. Perhaps
even a good one.
She's already learned a lot from Ashai's
"<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>" <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff>. I'm sure she'll grow
into a brilliant beauty—like her mother.
Com_Talk_31: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Sounds good.<sp:5:0:0> How many do you want?
GreetingAfter03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq!<sp:5:0:0> Come and get some fruit—fresh
as it can be!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a class that Ashai teaches. It's for all
the young vai in Gerudo Town so they
can learn about voe.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Class is held <clr:0000>underground<clr:ffff> in a <clr:0000>cave near
the Goddess Statue<clr:ffff>, but I can't leave the
shop and walk my daughter, Dalia, there.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>She takes after me though—smart as
they come! She can handle walking to
and from class by herself.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You picked a good one, didn't you?<sp:5:0:0>
They're perfect for eating now, you know.
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Are you holding out on me? I can buy
plenty more, you know.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sav'orq! I look forward to seeing
you again!
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I feel like you've got things that are even
more rare. Come on, sell me some more!
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I...<sp:5:0:0> I don't want to be harsh, considering
you've bought everything I had for sale...

But my daughter is home from the
"<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff> now, so could you
wrap up your business quickly?
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I can find joy in just looking at
things travelers have brought from
the outside world...
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hold it right there...<sp:5:0:0> Even though the
chief gave you special permission to
be here...
don't think for a minute that means I like
you going around, poking your nose into
Gerudo life.
My daughter is being responsible and
diligently attending the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000>
class<clr:ffff>—don't you distract her!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Was I not clear before?<sp:5:0:0> Even though the
chief gave you special permission to
be here...
don't think for a minute that means I like
you going around, poking your nose into
Gerudo life.
My daughter is being responsible and
diligently attending the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000>
class<clr:ffff>—don't you distract her!
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What is this, some kind of statement
about the value of my wares?<sp:5:0:0> I'm not
lowering the price...
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Sad>...Ugh. I can't believe the chief is letting
you stay in the shelter. She must be
playing some kind of joke...
I can't have you bothering my daughter—
she'll be the best vai in Gerudo Town after
she finishes the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>.
You just worry about what fruit you're
going to buy, and don't even think
about distracting her!
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Your pouch is full right to the limit...
Maybe you'd like to sell something
to me?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Just one thing...<sp:5:0:0> 


My daughter is attending the "<clr:0000>Voe and
You<clr:ffff>" <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff> right now, so if you want to
shop, do it quickly.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a class that Ashai teaches. It's for all
the young vai in Gerudo Town so they
can learn about voe.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Class is held in a <clr:0000>cave next to the
Goddess Statue<clr:ffff>, but I tend the shop and
can't walk my daughter, Dalia, there...
<sp:3:0:2:0100>She takes after me though—smart as
they come! She can handle walking to
and from class by herself.
...


<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> Don't even think about following her
to the class! Understand?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't forget what I said about
my daughter!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't forget what I said about
my daughter!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You still need something?


My daughter is attending the "<clr:0000>Voe and
You<clr:ffff>" <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff> right now, so if you want to
shop, do it quickly.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, that'd be great! Dalia would be so
interested in things from far-away places!
